title: Is there any application which allows one to cut recorded audio? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you select the file and click on the share icon, you should be able to export by email. Then download the file to your pc or Mac and use free Audacity audio editor to open and cut. Audacity will open most audio including .ogg. When you export the audio select the MP3 option. You will need Buanzos Lame MP3 ffmpeg plugin

You do not give much information in your question. If you mean you would like to edit digital audio on a computer from a voice recorder or something like that, a good choice is Audacity, which you can get for Windows, Mac OSX and Linux. You can get it here: Audacity®. It's free. If you mean can you do this on a mobile phone or tablet, then search for ‘audio editor’ on your App Store.
